title: Lullaby of Lies
description: Life for Madeleine Bride is almost perfect. She goes to a great school, she has awesome friends, she's in love with the Magnificent Eddy Moon.Her only problems are unanswered questions: Why does he keep disappearing? How are his disappearances connected to the beautiful Jenna DeGrace? And why has Levels been given a mysterious round table?The answers to the questions are terrifying.In its third instalment the Levels series reaches a climax as its characters face the end of everything, and everybody, they love.
author: J.D. Field
